item.title: Increasing Happiness
item.description:
The Science of Happiness

While taking the science of well being course on coursera I decided to take the course quite seriously. For one, I started without taking any of my baseline assumptions for granted and applied my skepticism as best as I could to “commong knowledge” ways of looking at happiness.

item.title: Decreasing Consumption, Increasing Happiness
item.description:
“It’s time to stop pointing fingers, finger pointing gets us no-where, Steve!” ~ Randy Marsh, South Park

In the past year I have reduced my carbon footprint to about 10% that of an average American without much effort. How?

Before telling other people how to live, I have found it is a good idea to examine my life thoroughly first. I know, I know– where is the fun in that?
